373. The Info Object C++ Bindings


Up: C++ Bindings (deprecated) Next: Process Creation and Management C++ Bindings Previous: MPI Environmenta Management C++ Bindings 


namespace MPI {
{ static Info Info::Create() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Info::Delete(const char* key) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ Info Info::Dup() const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Info::Free() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ bool Info::Get(const char* key, int valuelen, char* value) const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ int Info::Get_nkeys() const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Info::Get_nthkey(int n, char* key) const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ bool Info::Get_valuelen(const char* key, int& valuelen) const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Info::Set(const char* key, const char* value) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }

};
